item.title: 优步因司机身份争议与法国社会保障机构展开谈判
item.description: 优步周一表示，正与法国社会保障机构Urssaf进行磋商。此前有媒体报道称，该机构已认定这家美国公司应将其司机视为雇员。【原文：Uber said on Monday it was in talks with French social security agency Urssaf, which a media report said had concluded the U.S.-based company should treat its drivers as employees.】

item.title: 特朗普启动120亿美元矿产储备计划以对抗中国，彭博社报道
item.description: 据彭博社周一报道，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普计划启动一项战略性关键矿物储备计划，并投入120亿美元启动资金。该报道援引知情人士消息称。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is set to launch a strategic critical minerals stockpile with $12 billion in seed money, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Revvity在第四季度业绩大超预期后，预测2026年利润与营收将高于市场预期
item.description: 医疗设备制造商Revvity周一公布的财报远超市场预期，不仅第四季度业绩表现亮眼，其对2026年营收和利润的预测也高于华尔街预期。该公司押注诊断业务将持续强劲增长，尽管学术研究资金持续疲软。【原文：Medical equipment maker Revvity handily beat fourth-quarter estimates and forecast 2026 revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Monday, betting on continued strength in its diagnostics business even as weakness in academic research funding persists.】

item.title: 美国页岩油生产商德文能源与科特拉将以580亿美元达成合并协议
item.description: 美国页岩生产商德文能源公司和科特拉能源公司周一宣布，将以580亿美元的全股票交易方式合并，由此诞生美国最大的独立页岩生产商之一。【原文：U.S. shale producers Devon Energy and Coterra Energy are set to merge in a $58 billion all-stock deal to create one of the largest independent shale producers in the country, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 泰森食品季度利润超预期，得益于鸡肉需求强劲
item.description: 美国肉类加工企业泰森食品公司周一公布的季度财报显示，其盈利超出市场预期。尽管牛肉业务亏损严重，但强劲的鸡肉产品需求抵消了这一不利影响。【原文：U.S. meatpacker Tyson Foods reported bigger-than-expected quarterly earnings on Monday, as strong demand for its chicken products overshadowed hefty losses in its beef business.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局扩大对约130万辆福特F-150皮卡的调查，涉及变速箱问题。
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周一表示，已将针对127万辆福特F-150皮卡的安全调查范围扩大，此前有报告称该车型存在后轮锁死状态下意外降档的情况。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it had expanded a safety-related investigation into 1.27 million Ford F-150 pickup trucks following reports of unexpected downshifts with rear-wheel lockup.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计到2026年底金价将达到每盎司6300美元
item.description: 摩根大通在周一发布的一份报告中表示，随着央行和投资者需求的持续增长，预计到2026年底金价将达到每盎司6300美元。【原文：J.P. Morgan expects gold prices to reach $6,300 per ounce by the end of 2026, as demand from central banks and investors continues, it said in a note on Monday.】

item.title: 投资者一月份争相购买黄金及黄金矿业ETF寻求避险
item.description: 1月份，投资者纷纷涌向黄金、其他贵金属及黄金矿业公司的交易所交易基金，在地缘政治不确定性加剧、美元进一步走弱预期升温以及对美国降息押注增加的背景下寻求避险。【原文：Investors flocked to exchange-traded funds of gold, other precious metals and gold miners in January, seeking safety amid geopolitical uncertainty, expectations of further dollar weakness, and growing bets on U.S. interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 金属熔毁
item.description: 作者：马克·琼斯，全球市场通讯员【原文：By Marc Jones, Global Markets Correspondent】

item.title: 大宗商品暴跌引发全球市场震荡
item.description: 特朗普总统提名凯文·沃什担任下一任美联储主席引发抛售潮，贵金属连续第二个交易日暴跌。【原文：A selloff ​unleashed by President Donald Trump's choice of Kevin Warsh for the next U.S. Fed chair sent precious metals tumbling for a second session.】

item.title: 迪士尼主题乐园助力收益超出华尔街预期
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司凭借旗下主题公园及电影《疯狂动物城2》的强劲表现，在截至12月的假日季度财报中超出市场对营收和盈利的预期，其股价在周一盘前交易中上涨4%。【原文：Walt ​Disney's theme parks and the movie "Zootopia 2" helped the company beat revenue and earnings estimates for the ‌holiday quarter ended in December, sending its shares up 4% in premarket trading on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲的注册量显示1月份几乎没有复苏迹象
item.description: 特斯拉在欧洲部分主要市场的1月新车注册量几乎未见复苏迹象——该月通常是全年销量最低的月份之一。瑞典和丹麦市场有所增长，但法国和挪威市场则出现下滑。【原文：Registrations of new Tesla cars in some of its largest European markets showed little signs of recovery in January, one of the lowest-volume months, rising in Sweden and Denmark but falling in France and Norway.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价下跌，投资者正评估其高达500亿美元的人工智能融资计划
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一盘前交易中股价下跌约4%，此前该公司宣布计划今年筹集450亿至500亿美元资金用于扩展云基础设施，这加剧了投资者对其债务负担不断增加的担忧。【原文：Oracle shares fell about 4% in premarket trading on Monday, after it outlined plans to raise $45 billion to $50 billion this ​year to expand its cloud infrastructure, fueling investor concerns about ‌its rising debt load.】

item.title: 诺和诺德与礼来进军新纪元，肥胖症市场销售潜力趋紧
item.description: 华尔街长期以来预期全球肥胖症药物市场将在未来十年达到1500亿美元规模，但随着诺和诺德和礼来公司GLP-1治疗药物在美国价格下跌，以及现金支付的消费者市场竞争加剧，这一预期正变得愈发不确定。【原文：The long-held Wall Street expectation that the global market for obesity drugs would reach $150 billion in the next decade is looking a lot less certain with U.S. prices falling for GLP-1 treatments from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly and competition heating up in the cash-pay consumer market.】

item.title: 焦点：对冲基金削减北美地区持仓，因贸易紧张局势、美元疲软及巨型股走弱
item.description: 过去一年间，对冲基金正逐步将投资组合多元化转向北美以外地区，因资产管理公司正应对由全球贸易紧张局势、政策不确定性及美元走弱所引发的市场波动。【原文：Hedge funds have been diversifying their allocations away from North America over the past year, as money managers contend with market volatility driven by global trade tensions, policy uncertainty and a weaker U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 美国股指期货下跌，大宗商品暴跌引发市场震荡
item.description: 美国股指期货周一走低，贵金属市场的剧烈抛售令投资者在企业财报与重要经济数据密集发布的一周伊始感到不安。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Monday, as a violent selloff in precious metals unsettled investors at the start of a week packed with corporate earnings and major economic data.】

item.title: 美联储主席提名人沃什或许希望缩减美联储资产规模，但这并非易事。
item.description: 凯文·沃什被提名为下一任美联储主席，他或许希望大幅缩减这家央行数万亿美元的资产负债表。但专家一致认为，金融现实强烈表明实现这一目标将困难重重且进展缓慢——即便可能实现。【原文：Kevin Warsh, tapped to become the next Federal Reserve chair, may want to significantly contract the central bank’s multi-trillion-dollar balance sheet, but experts agree that financial realities strongly indicate accomplishing this goal will be difficult and slow, if it can be done at ​all.】

item.title: 尽管中美紧张局势持续，香港商业信心仍有所提升，调查指出
item.description: 尽管全球不确定性持续存在，香港美国商会周一发布的调查报告显示，2026年香港商业信心有所改善。【原文：Business confidence in Hong Kong has improved for 2026 despite continuing global uncertainty, according to a survey report published on Monday by the American Chamber of Commerce in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度石油公司与维托尔公司的合资谈判因部分条款出现障碍
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，印度石油公司与全球贸易商维托尔公司达成协议，拟成立一家对等贸易合资企业，但因合同条款存在分歧，该协议已被推迟。【原文：A deal between Indian Oil Corp and global trader Vitol to form an equal trading joint venture has been delayed due to differences over some clauses in the contract, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，TIM SA正就回购巴西光纤业务多数股权进行谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴西电信运营商TIM SA正就回购其曾控股的光纤网络业务51%股权进行谈判，该交易价值约1.7亿美元。【原文：Brazilian telecoms operator TIM SA is in talks to buy back a 51% stake in a fibre-network business it previously controlled under a deal that could be worth around $170 million, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: TrendForce预测芯片价格在第一季度较上一季度将飙升90-95%
item.description: 市场研究机构TrendForce周一表示，受人工智能热潮推动，已上调芯片价格预测，预计今年1月至3月期间传统DRAM合约价格将较2025年最后三个月上涨90%至95%。【原文：Market researcher TrendForce said on Monday that it has raised its chip price forecasts and expects conventional DRAM contract prices to jump by 90% to 95% in the January to March period of this year, from the final three months of 2025, citing the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 新加坡将成立航天机构以应对全球投资热潮
item.description: 新加坡贸易部周一宣布，该国将于4月1日成立国家航天局，旨在"充分把握全球航天经济增长带来的价值与机遇"。【原文：Singapore will launch its own space agency on April 1 as it bids to "fully harness the value and opportunities of the growing global space economy", the country's trade ministry announced on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Qoria公司将以6.75亿美元与美国Aura公司合并
item.description: 澳大利亚上市公司Qoria周一宣布将与美国企业Aura Consolidated Group合并，该交易使这家科技公司的估值达到9.72亿澳元（约合6.7564亿美元）。【原文：Australia-listed Qoria said on Monday it would merge with U.S.-based Aura Consolidated Group, in a deal that gives the tech firm an implied valuation of A$972 million ($675.64 million).】

item.title: 欧元区1月制造业活动萎缩但产出反弹，PMI数据显示
item.description: 一项调查显示，尽管产出已恢复增长，但由于新订单持续疲软，欧元区1月份制造业活动连续第三个月处于萎缩区间。【原文：Euro zone factory activity remained in contraction territory in January for the third straight month amid persistent weakness in new orders despite output returning to growth, a survey showed.】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示欧元区企业利润持续恶化
item.description: 欧洲央行周一发布的季度企业融资状况调查显示，欧元区企业预计本季度收入将继续增长，但盈利能力正受到冲击。【原文：Euro zone firms expect revenues to keep rising this quarter but profitability is taking a hit, the European Central Bank's quarterly Survey on the Access to Finance of Enterprises showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本首相高市早苗必须先赢得债券投资者的信任，才能赢得选民的支持。
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗在本周末提前大选前的最后冲刺阶段面临关键的市场考验，她希望通过决定性胜利获得推行扩张性财政政策的授权。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi faces a crucial markets test in the final run-up to a snap election this weekend where she is hoping a decisive victory will give her a mandate for expansionary fiscal policy.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称印度正就允许支付宝+接入其即时支付系统进行谈判
item.description: 两名政府消息人士向路透社透露，印度正与中国关联企业蚂蚁国际进行谈判，拟允许数字支付平台支付宝+接入印度领先的即时支付系统，以支持跨境交易。【原文：India is in talks with China-related Ant International to allow digital payments platform Alipay+ to be linked to India's leading instant payments system for cross-border transactions, two government sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本TDK公司表示受中国稀土限制措施影响，正推进业务多元化
item.description: 日本电子元件制造商TDK周一表示，该公司正受到中国对稀土出口限制的影响，并正在采取措施实现采购渠道多元化。【原文：Japan components manufacturer TDK said on Monday that it is being affected by Chinese export restrictions on rare earths and is taking steps to diversify its procurement sources.】

item.title: 新兴市场股票涨势在1月份资金涌入后似乎依然稳固
item.description: 1月份，全球投资者以数年来的最快速度向新兴市场股票注入资金。美元走软以及投资者寻求分散投资以减少对美国的依赖，都预示着该资产类别去年掀起的涨势将延续。【原文：Global investors poured money into emerging market stocks at the fastest clip in years in January, as a weaker dollar and diversification away from the U.S. point to an extension of the rally the asset class staged last year.】

item.title: BlueFive Capital完成30亿美元Onyx基金I募集，重点投资欧美科技领域
item.description: BlueFive Capital周一宣布，其30亿美元的Onyx基金I已完成募集，该基金将重点投资于欧美地区的科技领域机会型及成长型项目。【原文：BlueFive Capital closed its $3 billion Onyx Fund I, it said on Monday, targeting opportunistic technology and growth investments in the U.S. and Europe.】
